name: Clutter King
description:
The collection game where you've gotta find two of a kind.  Tap and match your way into the clouds with this blitzing beauty.

Click and collect your way through a campaign of randomly generated levels!

🌞 - Two unique games :  Match two and haystack mode

🌠 - Compete against friends and family for the highest campaign score and to claim the Clutter King Crown!

🔨 - Never play the same level twice. Randomly generated levels with unique themes to keep you on your toes.

🪀 - Non-stop fun for any age.

Clutter King - get it before it gets you!
